statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_name, optimal_stock, restock_threshold FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE restock_threshold < 10;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE optimal_stock > current_stock;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE restock_threshold > 10 ORDER BY current_stock DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, optimal_stock FROM inventory_levels WHERE restock_threshold BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT product_name, current_stock, restock_threshold FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock > optimal_stock AND restock_threshold < 5 ORDER BY product_id DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE current_stock = optimal_stock
SELECT * FROM Inventory
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100
SELECT item_name, last_restock_date FROM Inventory ORDER BY last_restock_date DESC
SELECT item_id, quantity, last_restock_date FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT item_name, quantity, last_restock_date FROM Inventory WHERE last_restock_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%shoes%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory
SELECT * FROM inventory_items;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT item_name, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory_items ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory_items WHERE restock_threshold < quantity_in_stock;
SELECT * FROM inventory_items WHERE quantity_in_stock > restock_threshold ORDER BY item_name DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity_in_stock FROM inventory_items WHERE item_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY quantity_in_stock ASC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE LENGTH(supplier_address) > 50
SELECT * FROM restock_orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT item_name, quantity_ordered FROM inventory_items JOIN restock_orders ON inventory_items.item_id = restock_orders.item_id WHERE quantity_ordered > quantity_in_stock
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE quantity > 50 AND price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT warehouse_id, warehouse_name, location FROM warehouses WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, quantity FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE inventory.quantity < 50;

SELECT products.product_name, warehouses.location, inventory.quantity FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id INNER JOIN warehouses ON inventory.warehouse_id = warehouses.warehouse_id WHERE products.category = 'Clothing' AND warehouses.location = 'New York';

SELECT products.product_name, warehouses.warehouse_name, SUM(inventory.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products INNER JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id INNER JOIN warehouses ON inventory.warehouse_id = warehouses.warehouse_id GROUP BY products.product_name, warehouses.warehouse_name HAVING total_quantity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems;
SELECT item_name, quantity, price FROM InventoryItems ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_id, quantity, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT item_id, quantity_sold, sale_date FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM InventoryItems WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT item_name, price FROM InventoryItems WHERE price BETWEEN 20.5 AND 50.75 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity FROM InventoryItems;
SELECT i.item_name, s.supplier_name FROM InventoryItems i JOIN Suppliers s ON i.id = s.supplier_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM Sales WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01';
